fields.name: Pending
fields.description: The event is pending and has not yet started.

fields.name: In Progress
fields.description: The event is currently in progress.

fields.name: Completed
fields.description: The event has been completed successfully.

fields.name: Failed
fields.description: The event has failed or encountered an error.

fields.name: Cancelled
fields.description: The event has been cancelled or aborted.

fields.name: On Hold
fields.description: The event is on hold and temporarily paused.

fields.name: Scheduled
fields.description: The event is scheduled to occur at a future date/time.

fields.name: Delayed
fields.description: The event has been delayed from its original schedule.

fields.name: In Transit
fields.description: The event is in transit or en route to a location.

fields.name: Arrived
fields.description: The event has arrived at a specific location.

fields.name: Inspected
fields.description: The event has been inspected or checked.

fields.name: Verified
fields.description: The event has been verified or validated.

fields.name: Accepted
fields.description: The event or item has been accepted.

fields.name: Rejected
fields.description: The event or item has been rejected.

fields.name: Pause
fields.description: The event Stopped status waiting on something else.

fields.name: Exception
fields.description: There was an exception or issue during the delivery process.
